meaning list.sentence translation: Lo yeke mbeni ngangu zo so alingbi ti hon ndo ti aye ti ngangu; Lo yeke zia lege ni lâ oko pëpe.

meaning list.meaning: Mbeni hingango ye wala akode so ayeke nde so a sala kusala na ni na yâ mbeni kusala (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: He learned the tricks of the trade from his mentor.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo manda akpengba ye ti kusala ni na mbage ti wafango ye na lo.

meaning list.meaning: Fango tâ sarango ye ti mbeni zo wala ye so lo leke na bê ti lo ti sara (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: She showed her true colours when she refused to help.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo fa tâ couleur ti lo na ngoi so lo ke ti mû maboko.

word: turn back the hands of time
phonetic american: tɜːrn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm
phonetic british: tɜːn bæk ðə hændz əv taɪm

meaning list.meaning: Ti kiri na ngoi so ahon wala ti kiri na ngoi (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: If I could turn back the hands of time, I’d make a different decision.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tongana mo lingbi ti kiri na ngoi na peko, ka mo mû mbeni desizion nde.

meaning list.meaning: Aye so e manda na yâ ti fini (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He never went to college but learned everything from the university of life.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo gue na kota da-mbeti pëpe, me lo manda aye kue na yâ ti gigi ti lo.

meaning list.meaning: Mbeni ye so ayeke si lâ oko pëpe (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: You can wait until hell freezes over, but I won’t change my mind.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mo lingbi ti ku lakue lakue me mbi yeke changé bê ti mbi pëpe.

meaning list.meaning: mbeni ye so ayeke gue ti buba wala so ayeke tï (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: All our hard work went up in smoke when the project was canceled.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ngangu kusala ti e kue abuba na ngoi so a kanga lege na kusala ni.

meaning list.meaning: ti ku mbeni lege, ti leke tele (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: She’s waiting in the wings for a chance to prove herself.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo yeke ku mbeni lege ti fa so lo yeke zo wa.

meaning list.meaning: ti zia wala ti son bê ti mbeni zo (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He walked out on his family when things got tough.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tongana aye aga ngangu, lo zia sewa ti lo.

meaning list.meaning: ti buba ngoi (idiome)
meaning list.sentence: We’re wasting time discussing irrelevant issues.
meaning list.sentence translation: E yeke buba ngoi ti sara lisoro na ndo ti atënë so ayeke kota ye pëpe.

meaning list.meaning: Système wala groupe so ayeke tambela nzoni (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: The team works like a well-oiled machine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Équipe ni ayeke sara kua tongana mbeni système so ayeke tambela nzoni.

meaning list.meaning: ti wara mbeni kota ngoi (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: We had a whale of a time at the amusement park.
meaning list.sentence translation: E sara ngia mingi na yâ ti parc ti ngia ni.

meaning list.meaning: Ti duti pale mingi ndali ti mbeto wala kobela (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He turned white as a sheet when he heard the news.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo ga vukongo ndo na ngoi so lo mä tënë ni.

meaning list.meaning: zo ti kua ti bureau, zo so ayeke sara kua ti li (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: White-collar jobs are becoming more common in urban areas.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kua ti bongo ti vuru ayeke ga mingi na yâ ti agbata.

meaning list.meaning: Mbeni ye so ngere ni ayeke ngangu mingi me so ayeke na lege ni pëpe (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: The stadium turned out to be a white elephant for the city.
meaning list.sentence translation: Stade ni aga mbeni ye so ngere ni ayeke ngangu mingi me so ayeke na lege ni pëpe teti gbata ni.

meaning list.meaning: Mbeni mvene so ayeke sara sioni na zo pëpe wala so a sara ni na nzoni bê (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: She told a white lie to avoid hurting his feelings.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo tene mbeni kete mvene ti tene lo son bê ti lo pëpe.

meaning list.meaning: ti honde mbeni faute wala mbeni faute (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: The company tried to whitewash the scandal.
meaning list.sentence translation: Kompani ni agi ti honde tënë ti sioni so asi.

meaning list.meaning: kue, ye kue (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: Tongana ala sara mbeni matanga, ala kue ayeke sigigi na adécoration nga na kobe.

meaning list.meaning: Na kota ngia nga na wâ (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Mbi yeke ga na matanga ti mo na kota ngia!

meaning list.meaning: Prix wala titre so a mû na zo so aga na peko (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ala wara matabisi ti cuillère ti keke ndali ti so ala yeke ndangba zo na yâ ti ligue ni.

meaning list.meaning: ti sara kua nzoni (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Fini ye ti sukulango na da so ayeke sala kusala nzoni mingi.

meaning list.meaning: Mo yeke sara lâ oko pëpe wala mo yeke duti na yâ ti mbeni ye (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: Mbi yeke yü bongo so lâ oko pëpe.

meaning list.meaning: Fani mingi, ngu na ngu, teti angu mingi (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ala yeke gue na oko plage ni ngu oko oko.

meaning list.meaning: zo ti mbeto, zo ti courage (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo yeke mbeni zo ti mbeto mingi ti tingbi na patron ti lo.

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks
phonetic american: juː kænt tiːʧ ən oʊld dɔːɡ nuː trɪks
phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: A yeke ngangu ti changé mbeni zo so ayeke na angbene sarango ye (idiom)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.
meaning list.sentence translation: Lo ke ti manda ti sara kua na mbeni téléphone so ayeke na nginza mingi; A yeke ngangu ti changé angbene sarango ye ti zo.

word: your guess is as good as mine
phonetic american: jʊr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn
phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: Mo hinga nga pëpe, apensé ti e use kue alingbi ti duti tâ tënë legeoko (idiom) .
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: Ngbanga ti nyen la train ni aga na retard? Mbi nga kue mbi hinga pëpe.
